typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Id as string,
		title as string,
		description as string,
		SpeakerId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SessionsSource
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SessionsDestination
SessionsSource exists(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> SessionExists
